infos.value: Now then, second division «Nitor» is departing!
Ooh!
Brotherrr!
I don't need you to see me off, Salire.
But I'm not seeing you off.
You're wearing such a short skirt again...?
Oh-oh? Could it be you're worried that other men will take a gander at meee?
Anyway, I'm coming with you whether you like it or not. I'm not going to be separated from my big brother.
I've always given up until now, but this time is different.
This time?
(Hey, Brother...you really haven't noticed?)
(Aren't there a lot of guys in the expeditionary unit this time who used to work under Glahz!?)
(If that was his intention all along, this is a good chance for me.)
(Hmmm, does that mean you have some sort of plan? Like using those guys as decoys and wiping them all out...?)
(Hahaha. That's also a good idea.)
Anyway! I'll be your guard, Brother!
Salire...
There are still a lot of Glahz's underlings here in Hourne, too.
Wouldn't it be even more dangerous if I stayed behind?
I suppose you have a point. But only this once.
Yaaay!
Well, then. Let's go.
